ENTY.parent double: specified child already has parent associated, try 'replace=True'
ENTY.child not found: not a child of given container
ENTY.edge conflict:
specified displacement conflicts with size of container,
make sure to set appropriate width and height
ENTY.circular inheritance: specified parent is already child of entity
ENTY.child overlap:
positions of children conflict/overlap with each other
to disable: overlap=True in your container

COLR.not a color: color does not exist, add it as a color or use rgb values
COLR.faulty format: wrong color format, need either keyword or rgb

LOG.key error:
value with key already exists
to overwrite key, set replace=True

ELMT.faulty frames:
Wrong frame format, shuld be:
 list[str] or list[list[str]]

CONS.too many processes: Number of processes cant be higher than cores

COMP.cached frame:
The frame was already compiled
 use get_cached to get the compiled frame
COMP.not compiled: The frame has not been compiled yet.
